shinyVirga 0.42.0
  • Reference

    Conver a list or vector to Sass variables

    list2sass.Rd

    Conver a list or vector to Sass variables

    Usage

    list2sass(x, pre = "", suf = "")

    Arguments

    x

    list/chr

    pre

    chr prefix to prepend

    suf

    chr suffix to append

    Value

    chr

    See also

    Other css: add_sass(), css_props()

    Examples

    list2sass(pre = "dark-", list(
  lightblue = "rgba(18,180,211,1)",
  darkblue = "rgba(2,120,170,1)",
  navyblue = "rgba(0,57,73,1)",
  brown = "rgba(72,36,18,1)",
  lightbrown = "rgb(132,96,78)",
  purple = "rgba(111,96,140,1)",
  lightpurple = "rgba(165,150,194,1)",
  darkcyan = "rgba(0,166,212,1)",
  darkturquoise = "rgba(9,119,168,1)"
)) |> cat(sep = '\n')
#> $dark-lightblue: rgba(18,180,211,1);
#> $dark-darkblue: rgba(2,120,170,1);
#> $dark-navyblue: rgba(0,57,73,1);
#> $dark-brown: rgba(72,36,18,1);
#> $dark-lightbrown: rgb(132,96,78);
#> $dark-purple: rgba(111,96,140,1);
#> $dark-lightpurple: rgba(165,150,194,1);
#> $dark-darkcyan: rgba(0,166,212,1);
#> $dark-darkturquoise: rgba(9,119,168,1);
